head.supplied: TREASURY, MELBOURNE, ¶ 27 Decr ¶ 187 ¶ 6 ¶ No. ¶ 8400 ¶ SIR, ¶ I am directed to request that you will be good enough to return to this Office, at your earliest convenience, the Letter referred to in...

div.p: From Acting Under Treasurer to the Secretary, Education Department.
77/153, unit 385, VPRS 794 central inwards registered correspondence, VA 714 Education Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: who is Secretary for Education and who is Acting Under Treasurer?

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS annotations by unknown: '76R/8092 From Government Printer dated 10th October 76 Submits specimen of Von Mueller's "School Flora" understands more copies will be required than were estimated for.'

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: [...]: 'Mr Hart Where is the letter referred to? [...]. 1.77'.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: [...]: 'M. O. Let Mr Arthur have the loan of the portion of the "Victorian School Flora" attached to the reference from the Treasury. Explain to him that it is all theat is left of the work, type having been broken up, & request him to return it as soon as possible. 28.2.77.'

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: I am directed to request that you will be good enough to return to this Office, at your earliest convenience, the Letter referred to in the margin, which was forwarded to you on the 10th October under Minute No. 2609

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
p.seg: I have the honor to be,
